object to be used directly from the port object, without explicitly

is added to support this.

The get(), get_by_id(), get_by_uuid(), get_by_address(), list(), and

`expected_attrs` argument. This is a list of optional attributes from
objects.port.PORT_OPTIONAL_ATTRS to be eagerly loaded on the Port
object. The eager loading is done with a join in the database.
If the parameter is not passed, the node will be lazily loaded from the

accessed that is not yet loaded on the object.

to RPC clients, and the hash in tests is updated accordingly.

translating a node from the database into a Node object. The Node object
version is bumped to 1.15 to signal this.

changes to the port object.
